title: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:timothyb89/lifx-tasker
message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:timothyb89/lifx-tasker

title: Attempted to fix some issues causing tasks to not execute on the first try --
message:
Attempted to fix some issues causing tasks to not execute on the first try --
seems to be working okay now

title: Update README.md
message: Update README.md

title: Updates for v1.2 and v1.3 firmware. Bulb data is now purged before running any
message:
Updates for v1.2 and v1.3 firmware. Bulb data is now purged before running any
Tasker actions to force a complete refresh.

title: increment version
message: increment version

title: reduce discovery wait time to match maximum wait time in findBulb().
message: reduce discovery wait time to match maximum wait time in findBulb().

title: switch to log4j and android-logging-log4j and added a new Logging wrapper to
message:
switch to log4j and android-logging-log4j and added a new Logging wrapper to
initialize log4j.
a logfile is now written to /sdcard/lifx-tasker.log (this may be turned off
for play store releases, we'll see)

title: added additional logging, and use a timer for gateway discovery (see issues #1
message:
added additional logging, and use a timer for gateway discovery (see issues #1
and #4)

title: added support for running actions on multiple bulbs at once in LIFXService,
message:
added support for running actions on multiple bulbs at once in LIFXService,
should improve performance with many bulbs (when that's working)

title: show toast warning when unable to bind to the UDP port
message: show toast warning when unable to bind to the UDP port

title: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:timothyb89/lifx-tasker
message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:timothyb89/lifx-tasker

title: * fixed editing workflow:
message:
* fixed editing workflow:
 * back button semantics revised (save if valid, cancel if invalid)
 * config save and restore implementetd
* reworked editing UI; generic support for different types of editors
* added new actions:
 * set color
 * pulse color

title: Update README.md
message: Update README.md

title: implemented a basic bulb selector (SimpleBulbList), implemented EditActivity,
message:
implemented a basic bulb selector (SimpleBulbList), implemented EditActivity,
and implemeted a basic FireReceiver. Tasker events for on/off/toggle now work

title: * convert to gradle project
message:
* convert to gradle project
* fix bugs in LIFXService
* mostly implement SimpleControlActivity
* fix automatic reconnect issues

message: removed color picker for the moment, and added a basic LIFXService
